column2: The Klocknerin Penthouse features modern wood finishes, the fireplace radiates cozy warmth and the large windows provide you with an open view of the panorama around Bramberg. Living close to nature, the Klocknerin Penthouse will make you and your family feel at home.

The ambience in Penthouse Teufelshorn is truly heavenly. The soft glow of the sunset through the panoramic window bathes the visible roof beams and the warm wood of the spacious living area in red gold.
